description.raw:
For teams that simply want to see whether their image is working on some reasonable version of a task there is no need for them to generate their own worlds from the yaml. This PR adds the worlds that they would produce if they were to use the given yaml files without modification \(which is likely what they will do\). This allows us to simplify testing instructions.

To test:

Follow the tutorial [here](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/Testing%20your%20submission) but skip step 2 under Verify your docker image is working.
